**EW699-240506A - Notice to Industry: BAF-3 Radar Site Remediation**

*   **Solicitation Number:** WS4085670714
*   **Publication Date:** August 16, 2023
*   **Remediation Project Overview:**

    The Department of National Defense has initiated a process to remediate the BAF-3 Radar Site. The project will involve the remediation of contaminated sites and potential removal of structures. As a result, the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defense, will be issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) to select a qualified firm to perform the remediation work. The selected contractor will be required to adhere to privacy protection, health, and safety regulations.

*   **Notice to Industry Details:**

    The RFP will be released in two stages. 

*   Stage 1: Preparation Phase: During this phase potential tenderers will be required to provide an initial submission, as detailed in the Request for Information package.
*   Stage 2: Competitive Bidding Phase: Respondents will be shortlisted, and then asked to submit a fully detailed bid as specified in the Request for Proposals package. The remediation project will take place within the springs 2024 to 2028. Interested firms must be registered on the Inuit Firm Registry to be eligible to bid on this project.
 
    **More Information is available on the website. NOTE:** Variant closing time 

Your bid submission must be received by: 1:00 pm EDT on September 29. Bids submitted after this time will result in a bid being declared non-responsive.

**Eligible firms:**

- Companies need to be registered on the Inuit Firm Registry
- Must meet all the Requirements stated and disclosed in the Request Documents submitted to them during the Bilateral meeting
